page.title: 04Clivocast Farm,Uyeasound.
page.content: My uncle owns Clivocast farm and has 50 hectares of land all over Uyeasound.He works full-time and has a full-time worker on the Youth Opportunities Scheme.Other people work part-time.The busiest time of year is Voar when lambing takes place. He grows half a hectare of potatoes, 4 hectares of barley,25 and a half hectares of grass for cutting and 20 hectares of grass for grazing. He has 90 cattle and 480 ewes and lambs.He also keeps ponies.He sells his animals in September or October when they are in good condition from being outdoors eating fresh grass. He has a lot of machinery including tractors,ploughs,harvesters,trailers, spreaders and electric sheep shears.He got some of the things from his Dad,my Grandad,because he owned the farm before my uncle.
